definition: bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: Shamire lives in the barn in Wyoming.
sentences.chinese: 夏米爾還活着，在懷俄明州的牲口棚裏。

sentences.english: Cheney was vacationing at his home in Wyoming.
sentences.chinese: 錢尼正在懷俄明州家鄉度假。

sentences.english: Six kilometers north of Jackson, Wyoming, is the Grand Teton National Park.
sentences.chinese: 在懷俄明州傑克遜以北六公里處便是大臺頓國家公園。

sentences.english: So Wyoming is the Cowboy State.
sentences.chinese: 因此懷俄明州被稱爲“牛仔州”。

sentences.english: Bones of Elasmosaurus have been found in the United States in Wyoming.
sentences.chinese: 在美國的懷俄明州發現過依拉絲莫龍的化石。

sentences.english: The western state of Wyoming was once an area where cattle were transported east.
sentences.chinese: 西部的懷俄明州曾經是往東部運牛的地區。

sentences.english: Some might call it blackmail. The governor of Wyoming calls it desperation.
sentences.chinese: 有人說是敲詐，懷俄明州政府更願意稱之爲無奈之舉。
